title: Kristen Faulkner Interview: ‘I’d Love To See America Pay More Attention to Women’s Racing’
content:
US cycling's breakout star on where she keeps her gold medals, how she hopes to inspire different generations and the moment she knew she could win the Olympic road race.

Read the full article at Kristen Faulkner Interview: ‘I’d Love To See America Pay More Attention to Women’s Racing’ on Velo.
author: Andy McGrath
